publications.title: Original Research Report Derivation of a New Human Embryonic Stem Cell Line, Endeavour-1, and Its Clonal Propagation

differentiation_results.description: Directed differentiation to definitive endoderm using activin A; endoderm markers AFP, SOX17, FOXA2, and GATA4 expressed; immunostaining confirmed.
Differentiation toward ectoderm with nestin expression.
Differentiation toward mesoderm with renin expression.
